amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide for the President's funding request for military operations in Kosovo; increase various defense programs including military pay; provide emergency food assistance; and include funding for various agriculture and disaster relief programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 and printed in H. Rept. 106-127 to provide for the President's funding request for military operations in Kosovo; increase various defense programs including military pay; provide emergency food assistance; and include funding for various agriculture and disaster relief programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 164 - 260 (Roll no. 118).
